metadata.Title: CVE-2024-23301 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Relax-and-Recover (aka ReaR) through 2.7 creates a world-readable initrdwhen using GRUB_RESCUE=y. This allows local attackers to gain access tosystem secrets otherwise only readable by root.

criterions.comment: rear: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
